CustomField.formula: TEXT(YEAR(EBH_DealStartDate__c)) + "-" + LPAD(TEXT(MONTH(EBH_DealStartDate__c)), 2, "0") + "-" + LPAD(TEXT(DAY(EBH_DealStartDate__c)), 2, "0") + " " + IF(LEN(TEXT(HOUR(EBH_DealStartTime__c))) = 1, "0"+TEXT(HOUR(EBH_DealStartTime__c)), TEXT(HOUR(EBH_DealStartTime__c))) + ":" + IF(LEN(TEXT(MINUTE(EBH_DealStartTime__c))) = 1, "0"+TEXT(MINUTE(EBH_DealStartTime__c)), TEXT(MINUTE(EBH_DealStartTime__c)))
CustomField.label: Deal Start Date/Time
